navigation.linksDescription: Manage services linked with your account

general.changeNotPossible: Currently, it is not possible to change your email address and your username. If you wish to change those, please contact us on Discord.

sessions.sureInvalidation: Are you really sure, that you want to invalidate this session?

minecraft.title: Link your Minecraft account
minecraft.howTo: To link your account, join our Minecraft server using the ip <1>bte-germany.de</1>. Then type in the command to link your Minecraft account <3>/link</3>. Now you will get a code, which you can use on the next page.
minecraft.enterCode: Enter the code which you got from the previous step here.
minecraft.successText: Your Minecraft account {{username}} was successfully linked to your BTE Germany account.
minecraft.error: There was an error linking your account. If this error persists, please contact us on Discord.
minecraft.unlinkError: There was an error unlinking your account. If this error persists, please contact us on Discord.
